splashMedia.description: A decorative photo of UX Design.

nodes.concentrationSummary: The user experience is created and shaped by design .

WhatDoesItMean.WhatDoesItMean: Interactive media is the creation of web site front ends developed for the digital world. Creative talents are expressed through hands on projects represented in and outside the classroom. From graphic design to user testing, interactive media give you a full perspective of how the creative process works -  from start to finish.

learningOutcomesSummary.learningOutcomesSummary: Design is a dynamic industry with many new skill sets being defined as the workforce becomes more involved in complex and creative problem solving.
